blur_home.description: Option to blur the YouTube home page

time_left.description: Label for remaining focus session time

heading.message: Hello there! Up to mischief are we?

prompt.message: What plans are brewing or should I say bearing?
prompt.description: Prompt asking user for their intention

warning.message: Wow that's a while! I think a more thoughtful reason would help keep our focus! (15+ characters).
warning.description: Warning shown if intention is too short for long durations

duration.message: How long should we watch together for?

settings_locked_during_session.message: Settings cannot be configured during a session
settings_locked_during_session.description: Alert shown when trying to open settings during a focus session
